feed.title: Immich-Frame Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Immich-Frame: v1.0.16.0
entry.content:
[!NOTE]
This release does not include any changes to the clientapps!

Overview

Splitview

This version introduces Splitview for portrait images. ImmichFrame displays images side by side if the display order contains two portrait images. This means that not all portrait images are displayed in a split view.

Webcalendar support

You can now display one or multiple web calendars. See documentation.

Memories

If the memories are the only asset source, ImmichFrame will display them in the correct order.

Shortcuts

Space: Pause/Play Arrow right (‚Üí): Display next asset

What's Changed

‚ö° Fixes

  • Fix: Temperature to one decimal by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/176
  • Fix: Splitscreen width by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/177
  • Fix: Font size for clock by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/179

üåê immichFrame WebApp

  • Feat: Display calendar by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/171
  • Feat: Shortcuts by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/175
  • Feat: Splitview for vertical images by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/173
  • Feat: Show memories in order by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/178
  • Feat: Implement imageLocationFormat by @3rob3 in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/180

üöÄ Other changes

  • Task: Add gradient icon variant by @damongolding in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/174

New Contributors

  • @damongolding made their first contribution in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/174

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/compare/v1.0.15.0...v1.0.16.0

entry.title: New release for Immich-Frame: v1.0.17.1

This is a hotfix mainly for #191

entry.title: New release for Immich-Frame: v1.0.19.0
entry.content:
[!Warning] The setting FontColor was renamed to PrimaryColor. Rename this setting in your configuration!

[!Note] All clientapps can be downloaded here.

What's Changed

‚ö†Ô∏è Breaking Changes

  • Feat: Clock & Metadata styling by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/199

üåê immichFrame WebApp

  • Feat: Setting for people description by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/197
  • Feat: Date Filter for images by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/200

üìì Documentation

  • Feat: Landing page - Added brief instructions for all platforms by @3rob3 in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/202

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/compare/v1.0.18.0...v1.0.19.0
